title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: When opening multiple files in the application and then closing the application, the files do not appear in the File menu's Most Recently Used (MRU) list upon restarting the application.
EB: The files that were opened in previous sessions should appear in the File menu's MRU list upon restarting the application.
SR:
1. Start the application. 
2. Open 2 or 3 files. 
3. Shutdown the application. 
4. Restart the application.
